fill_form_correctly: Heey, you must fill the fields correctly ;D
auth_success: Nice! We are logging you in ;D
auth_failed_invalid_email: Oops, this email is not formatted properly :O. Please, could you try it again?
auth_failed_wrong_password: Oops, this is not the correct password :O
auth_failed_user_not_found: Ouch!! This email don't belong to us yet ;(
auth_failed_user_disabled: Humm, it seems this email is not yet activated.
auth_failed_too_many_requests: Sorry, it seems our servers are too busy right now ;(
auth_failed_operation_not_allowed: Heey! This operation is not allowed! :O
unknown_error_auth: Sorry, we encountered an error during the process, If it persists, please contact us.
auth_failed_weak_password: Oops, this password is to weak ;/. Send him to the GYM and come back ;D
auth_failed_email_already_in_use: Ouch!! This email is already in use :O
